jointable.name: GdSubItemInfo
jointable.select: select a.items_id, a.shop_id, a.show_type, a.data_type, a.has_child, a.items_name, a.name_spr, a.items_intro, a. small_pic, a.big_pic, a.http_url, a.price, a.aunit, a.discount, a.member_price, a.update_time, a. state, a.update_no, b.orders_time from gd_items_info a, gd_items_item_rel b where a.items_id = b.items_child and b.items_id = ? order by orders_time desc
